Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/Maxwell
ShortDescription: Southbound 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Roosevelt, Racine, 18th and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/Maxwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Roosevelt, Racine, 18th and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/Maxwell.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/delays following an earlier sick customer at Harlem (Forest Park Branch). Service is resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Harlem (Forest Park Branch). 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
